mapper.insert:
SELECT UUID_SHORT() as goods_id
INSERT INTO sh_goods ( goods_id, goods_des, goods_count, goods_state, goods_title, goods_cid, goods_sellingPrice, goods_originalPrice, goods_updateTime, goods_releaseTime,goods_uid,goods_nao )
VALUES(#{goodsId},#{goodsDes},#{goodsCount},0,#{goodsTitle}, #{goodsCid1},#{goodsSellingPrice},#{goodsOriginalPrice},NOW(), NOW(),#{shUser.userId},#{goodsNao})
mapper.select: SELECT goods_id goodsId, goods_title goodsTitle FROM sh_goods WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId}

SELECT goods_id goodsId, goods_title goodsTitle, goods_count goodsCount, goods_state goodsState, goods_des goodsDes, goods_nao goodsNao, goods_sellingPrice goodsSellingPrice, goods_originalPrice goodsOriginalPrice FROM sh_goods

SELECT goods_id goodsId, goods_title goodsTitle, goods_des goodsDes, goods_ReleaseTime goodsReleaseTime, goods_state goodsState, su.user_id userId, su.user_num userNum, su.user_name userName, su.user_phone userPhone FROM sh_goods sg, sh_user su WHERE sg.goods_uid = su.user_id
AND su.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT goods_id goodsId, goods_title goodsTitle, goods_des goodsDes, sc.class_id , si.des_id desId, si.des_info desInfo, si.des_xsPath desXsPath FROM sh_goods sg, sh_class sc, sh_goodsimagedescription si WHERE sg.goods_cid = sc.class_id AND sg.goods_state = 1 AND sc.class_id = #{classId} AND sg.goods_id = si.des_gid GROUP BY sg.goods_id
SELECT goods_id goodsId, goods_title goodsTitle, goods_des goodsDes, goods_sellingPrice goodsSellingPrice FROM sh_goods sg WHERE goods_id=#{ goodsId}

SELECT goods_id goodsId, goods_title goodsTitle, goods_des goodsDes, goods_count goodsCount, goods_sellingPrice goodsSellingPrice, goods_originalPrice goodsOriginalPrice, goods_nao goodsNao, su.user_id userId, su.user_num userNum, su.user_name userName, su.user_phone userPhone FROM sh_goods sg, sh_user su WHERE sg.goods_uid = su.user_id AND sg.goods_state = 1 AND sg.goods_id=#{goodsId}
mapper.update: UPDATE sh_goods SET goods_state=#{goodsState} WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId}
mapper.select: SELECT goods_id goodsId, goods_title goodsTitle, goods_count goodsCount, goods_state goodsState, goods_des goodsDes, goods_nao goodsNao, goods_cid goodsCid1, goods_sellingPrice goodsSellingPrice, goods_originalPrice goodsOriginalPrice FROM sh_goods WHERE goods_id =#{goodsId}
mapper.update: UPDATE sh_goods SET goods_nao =#{goodsNao}, goods_title=#{goodsTitle}, goods_des=#{goodsDes}, goods_cid = #{goodsCid1}, goods_count=#{goodsCount}, goods_state = 0, goods_originalPrice =#{goodsOriginalPrice}, goods_sellingPrice =#{ goodsSellingPrice}, goods_updateTime = NOW( ) WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId}
